tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We went for the treatment of our daughter who is 3 years and 8 months old. She had multiple cavities in her teeth which needed dental fillings. We tried before with some other doctors but they could not even open her mouth. Then we came to know about Dr Abhirup Goswami and the result was just amazing. In a single sitting that too on our first visit,  he did the needful treatment and we were extremely happy with his behaviour too. We would definitely recommend any parents who may look for a dentist for their child (Pododentist).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dental Care Serampore for multiple Root Canal treatments and replacement of missing teeth. The doctor was very patient and explained me the entire treatment plan. The treatments were absolutely painless and I'm extremely happy. His friendly behaviour and excellent clinical hand is appreciable. Also his clinic is very well maintained with all modern equipments along with sterilisation protocols. I strongly recommend Dr. Abhirup Goswami for any kind of dental treatments.
reply_text: Thank you so much mam for your kind words

review: Dr made me understand the disease condition and how to prevent further complications. He is also very cheerful in his approach

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
